desc: A ruby carved in the shape of a teardrop.

dictionary.lore: A ruby carved in the shape of a teardrop. When the Hemet of Aesys learnt about the fall of Osiris, they shared in the solace of their goddess and carved ornate teardrop jewels from great rubies. In defiance of the God-King, the priestesses continued to carry out their seasonal rites in secret.

name: Enveloping Grief
